response.summary:
I am an Electronic Engineer with knowledge in CAN networks, hardware and software programming languages, data analytics, control, communications, antenna design and radio frequency signals conditioning by software. I have experience in the implementation of large-scale IoT projects and on metrology labs. 

I am a pro-active person with the willingness and enthusiasm to develop/implement strategies to solve
issues. I have the capability to work under pressure and take on challenges.
response.skills: Radiofrecuencia (RF), Internet of Things (IoT), Sistemas embebidos, Diseño de sistemas de control, Aprendizaje automático, Metrology, Open Source Software, Python (Programming Language), Java, C++, VHDL, Verilog, Matlab, Servicio de atención al cliente, Manejo de simuladores Full-wave, Diseño de antenas, CST Microwave Studio, LTSpice, Antenna Measurements, Low-Noise Amplifier (LNA)

profile_positions.description:
Duties:
• Installation of 440 telemetry devices for a custom IoT telemetry
project in a BRT system.
• Design of a Power BI dashboard to manage the preventive services of the telemetry devices as well as monitoring some customer KPIs.
• Software and hardware design and implementation for troubleshoot and data analysis.
• Continuous feedback, throughout test reports, to the Czech Republic development team, about the results of the troubleshooting tests in the QA and production stages of the project.
• To design and write the operation manuals for the customer technical personal.
• To reply all the service and warranty cases requested by the customers
• To be the communication bridge between local customers and
development team, in order to solve issues and attend requirements.
• Installation and development of pilot projects for new potential
customers
profile_positions.title: Telematics support engineer

company.name: LABE - Laboratorio de Ensayos Eléctricos Industriales Fabio Chaparro

profile_positions.description: Elaboration of calibration reports, sample reception, assistance in measurements assembly and laboratory maintenance
profile_positions.title: Technical assistant

education.field_of_study: Power electronics for high eciency electric vehicles

company.name: Interherence
company.description:
Our state-of-the-art devices target the optical microscopy market worldwide with a focus on high and super resolution applications.
#QuScite is the first commercial implementation of waveguide-based TIRF microscopy.
https://interherence.com/quscite/
#VAHEAT is a miniaturized temperature controller for microscopy.
https://interherence.com/vaheat/

Ease of use and increased experimental reproducibility is what we aim for, when designing our products.
 We are open to custom solutions and OEM partnerships!
